alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Norfolk and north central Plymouth Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hingham, or near Weymouth, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Weymouth, Marshfield, Hingham, Scituate, Rockland, Hanover, Norwell, Hull, Hanson and Cohasset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
